heading: HR00407
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY TO IMMEDIATELY INVESTIGATE THE ALLEGED DELAY IN THE COMPLETION OF THE DOTR-ROAD TRANSPORTATION IT INFRASTRUCTURE PROJECT-LTO COMPONENT CAUSING UNDUE HARM AND PREJUDICE TO THE PUBLIC AND TO RE-ALLOCATE THE REQUESTED BUDGET OF P550,000,000.00 FOR THE PROJECT TO OTHER MEANINGFUL PROJECTS
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2019-11-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00407
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY TO IMMEDIATELY INVESTIGATE THE ALLEGED DELAY IN THE COMPLETION OF THE DOTR-ROAD TRANSPORTATION IT INFRASTRUCTURE PROJECT-LTO COMPONENT CAUSING UNDUE HARM AND PREJUDICE TO THE PUBLIC AND TO RE-ALLOCATE THE REQUESTED BUDGET OF P550,000,000.00 FOR THE PROJECT TO OTHER MEANINGFUL PROJECTS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : PADUANO, JOSEPH STEPHEN S.
DATE FILED : 2019-10-01
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2019-11-27
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2019-10-02;
